hero.title: Building
hero.description: I'm a passionate fullstack developer specializing in creating responsive and user-friendly web applications using .NET, Javascript, Typescript, React, Next.js, and Vue.

skills.title: Skills & Technologies
skills.description: I've mastered a wide range of technologies for fullstack development. I'm always learning new technologies and keeping up with the latest tools and frameworks.

projects.title: Recent Projects
projects.description: Check out my latest work. These projects showcase my technical abilities and problem-solving skills.
projects.subheader: Showcasing my recent work and personal projects

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I'm a passionate fullstack developer with over 3 years of experience building web applications. My specialization is development using .NET framework & JS (Typescript, React, Vue).
about.description: I'm passionate about creating clean, efficient, and user-friendly applications. When I'm not coding, I enjoy exploring new technologies or engaging in outdoor activities.
